group_1.textLeft: So here we go again this week!
Urara!

group_1.textRight: And Kurara's!

group_1.textLeft: We're bringing you today's show from our usual@recording studio!

group_1.textRight: ...So, Urara, you have something to apologize@for first, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
I've been talking about Magical Girls on this show@for a while now,
but, see, it's all really just an urban legend, and@we don't know if they actually exist.

group_1.textRight: Honestly, I wish you'd really just stop spreading@misinformation that confuses the public...
After I told Urara that there's no such thing as@Magical Girls,
I never expected the situation to get so@complicated...

group_1.textLeft: Word got out about Magical Girls, and the response@was better than I expected,
so I thought I'd put on a show at the Festival,@y'know...

group_1.textRight: You mean that special guest you talked about,@right?

group_1.textLeft: My idea was to bring on someone good at sword@fighting to get the audience all excited, see...
So, what I'm getting at is...
Because of me making a big fuss and spreading@the story of Magical Girls to everyone,
that guest in the leaked video is now getting in@a lot of trouble...
That's why, I'm begging you...
The stories I've been telling up to now were all@just based on urban legends,
and I've been embellishing them with various@details to tell my own tales, you see...

group_1.textRight: Let's just drop the Magical Girl topic now@and forget about it once and for all, alright?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: After all, I've also been caught up in this mess@as a victim myself.
So from now on, no more Magical Girl talk,@not even to me, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'm sorry about all this...

group_1.textRight: I mean, it's just as silly as believing in ghosts,@right? Utterly ridiculous...

group_1.textLeft: So this was the show that aired yesterday.

group_1.textRight: She was one of the precious few who viewed@Magical Girls in a positive light, but...

group_1.textLeft: Right now, pretending that our encounter was a@dream or an illusion is the wisest course of action...
Yes... But I hope she's not being bullied at school...

group_1.textRight: After all, even I am being subjected to cold stares...
Himuro-dono and Sasha-dono, have things@remained unchanged for you?
Looking at the messages in the Magical Girl@group chat,
I see there are others facing situations similar@to mine...

group_1.textLeft: ...Actually, I am also being kept at a distance by@those around me...
Even I, with my already tenuous relationships,@can now feel their sharp stares.

group_1.textRight: So, it is as I thought...
The video that leaked on the internet shouldn't@have shown anyone but me, and yet...

group_1.textLeft: It seems there's a method circulating among@students
on how to identify Magical Girls by looking at@their rings...
The attempt to raise awareness about Magical Girls,
starting with us and then spreading to others,
has its unintended consequences,@I guess you could say...
It is the result of those with a bad impression@of us figuring out how to distinguish us...

group_1.textRight: Perhaps it would be better to take our rings off...

group_1.textLeft: By the time you feel their gazes on you,@it's already too late.
I don't know if telling other Magical Girls to be on@their guard will even protect them...

group_1.textRight: I knew it...@You're that bitch from the video, aren'tcha?

group_1.textLeft: A-are you talking about me...?

group_1.textRight: Heh, I was right to tail ya 'cause of that ring you@got on your finger.
My buddy also got hurt at the Festival and@had to be hospitalized, you know?
It's fate that brought us here to meet.@Girl or not, I don't give a damn.
I'm gonna make you suffer the same pain, asshole!

group_1.textLeft: That was beyond my control...!

group_1.textRight: To hell with your goddamn excuses!

group_1.textCenter: Look, I don't wanna make a scene, so if you think@you're gonna win, just do it.

group_1.textRight: Besides, attacking a woman is just shameful@in and of itself.

group_1.textLeft: I know, Senpai.
